SEARCH
Package com.cache

Interface CacheEditer<K,T>

Type Parameters:
K - The type of keys in the cache.
T - The type of values stored in the cache.
All Known Implementing Classes:
AppCache, BranchCache, EmployeeCache, MenuCache, OrderCache
public interface CacheEditer<K,T>
The CacheFetcher interface defines methods for editing items from a cache.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addItem(K key, T item)
    Adds an item to the cache with the specified key.
    void
    removeItem(K key, Optional<Predicate<Object>>... filters)
    Removes an item from the cache using the specified key and optional filters.

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      void addItem(K key, T item)
      Adds an item to the cache with the specified key.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to associate with the item in the cache.
      item - The item to add to the cache.

    • removeItem

      void removeItem(K key, Optional<Predicate<Object>>... filters)
      Removes an item from the cache using the specified key and optional filters.
      Parameters:
      key - The key of the item to remove from the cache.
      filters - Optional filters to apply when removing the item. Compulsory for MenuCache.
